_sText:
NOTE; MAP HAS BEEN UPDATED!!! here's the link!
http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/75884

THIS MAP HAS NOT GOT ANY MAJOR PROBLEMS BUT I'M WRITING IN CAPSLOCK SO YOU UNDERSTAND THERES AN UPDATED VERSION - THANKS

-------

This is a map i made in my time off this winter, its got plenty of ways to go if you want to surprise the other team, it advertises 2girls1cup, cats and crazy santa-like chimney jumping, there are buyzones and a hidden gun just in case you run out of cash, bots seem to play the map pretty well if that's what you're into. It bears mild resembelance to cs_italy, very much in the T-spawn in the house, and also some in the building surrounding the map. It is very small and action starts right from the second you start the round. It's good for large amounts of players or just you and your friends on LAN servers, I made it and I know i'm being a bit biased, but trust me when i say its the most intense, fast played and camper unfriendly map since fy_poolday. it's the cat's pyjamas baby, merry christmas or happy hannuka 

if you have any mapping requests, contact me on 
steam :   katteneleger
Gmail  :   kamikaze.fallafel@gmail.com
